# 𓆦 ⋍ 𒉏 𒍮 𒁍 󲊢 󲄅 󲄄 󲄆 󲉁

𒉏 fly, high

𒉏 #zubbum ≈
𒍮𒁍 zum-buˡ 𓆦 fly, Brummer ( onomatopoeia : summ / zoom )

𓂝 𓆑 𓆑 𓅭 | fly | avi… (aviation) ⇔ avis 𓄿 𓊪 𓂧 𓅬 ophtha opter πτερόν pterón “wing” GR / fai 飞 fēi ++?
𓂝 𓆑 𓆑 𓆦 | fly (insect) | мува muva ma.auva +++ ma.avv ⇔ μυῖα muîa ma.oƒt ⇔ mosca μύγα mýga муха Mücke / moth
𓂝 𓆑 𓆑 𓆦 | fly (insect) | opt ⇔ ბუზი buzi
𓂝 𓆑 𓆑 𓆤 | buzz (of insect) | opt ⇔ a'buzz 2. move? 3. 𓆑𓆑 summen--

𓅭 𓏤 | fly
